title: Manager Profile : My accounts and my tools
content: Mobile Application On the mobile application, Manager can:Contact other managersCommunicate with employees individuallyManage availabilityManage shift exchanges and replacement requestsSee the daily schedules of his teamPunch remotely for shifts and tasksUse these articles to understand how the mobile application works.Employee PortalFor a manager, the employee portal allows him to display his information in a restricted manner. To access it, use your user code and password at the following address: emprez.netHe will have to connect to his Management portal to access the functions of Managers.Use this guide to locate yourself on the employee portalUse this guide to take ownership of your responsibilities as Manager.Helpful?10Updated: 3 years ago Share :
